paper.title: Active forgetting in machine learning and its application to financial problems
paper.abstract: One of main features in financial investment problems is that the situation changes very often over time. Under this circumstance, in particular, it has been observed that additional learning plays an effective role. However, since the rule for classification becomes more and more complex with only additional learning, some appropriate forgetting is also necessary. It seems natural that many data are forgotten as the time elapses. On the other hand, it is expected more effective to forget unnecessary data actively. In this paper, several methods for active forgetting are suggested. The effectiveness of active forgetting is shown by examples in stock portfolio problems.

domain_result.justification: 该论文讨论了在金融投资问题中应用主动遗忘技术，特别是在股票投资组合问题中展示了其有效性，这明确属于投资组合管理的范畴。
